lanServer.publish: Allow players connected to a different router to join
tooltip.lan_extender.auth_token: Get this from "Your Authtoken" at www.ngrok.com
tooltip.lan_extender.region: Set this to where you are to get a faster connection
tooltip.lan_extender.copy_on_publish:
Automatically copy the server address when you
Open to LAN, making it easy to share with others
error.lan_extender.failed_to_publish: Failed to publish your world. Please verify that your ngrok authtoken is correct.
warning.lan_extender.missing_authtoken.h: LAN Extender has not been set up
warning.lan_extender.missing_authtoken.m: You will not be able to share your LAN worlds to the Internet until you connect LAN Extender to your Ngrok account. To configure the mod, click "LAN Extender" on the next screen.
warning.lan_extender.missing_authtoken.c: Do not show this screen again
message.lan_extender.address_changed: Your world's address has been changed to %s
message.lan_extender.address_changed_cop: Your world's address has been changed to %s (Copied to clipboard)
message.lan_extender.world_published: Your world has been published! Join it @ %s
message.lan_extender.world_published_cop: Your world has been published! Join it @ %s (Copied to clipboard)
